name: Soccer
description: Association football, more commonly known as football or soccer, is a team sport played between two teams of eleven players with a spherical ball.

name: Motorsport
description: Motorsport or motor sport is a global term used to encompass the group of competitive sporting events for racing or non-racing competition.

name: Fighting
description: Combat (French for fight) is a purposeful violent conflict meant to weaken, establish dominance over, or kill the opposition where it is not wanted or needed.

name: Baseball
description: Baseball is a bat-and-ball game played between two teams of nine players each who take turns batting and fielding.

name: Basketball
description: Basketball is a limited-contact sport played on a rectangular court. While most often played as a team sport with five players on each side.

name: American Football
description: American football, referred to as football in the United States and Canada, and also known as gridiron football or simply gridiron.

name: Ice Hockey
description: Ice hockey is a contact team sport played on ice, usually in a rink, in which two teams of skaters use their sticks to shoot a vulcanized rubber puck into their opponent's net to score points.

name: Golf
description: Golf is a club and ball sport in which players use various clubs to hit balls into a series of holes on a course in as few strokes as possible.

name: Rugby
description: Rugby usually refers to rugby union or sometimes rugby league, which are both team sports, rugby union originating at Rugby School in Rugby, Warwickshire.
